<h3>Functional relationships for <script type="math/tex">\;X \sim G(p),\;\;x=1,2,...;  0<p<1</script>
</h3>
$$
\\begin{aligned}
f(x|p)&=p(1-p)^{x-1}\\\\\\\\
F(x|p)&=1-(1-p)^{x}\\\\\\\\
h(x|p)&=\\frac{p(1-p)^{x-1}}{(1-p)^{x-1}}=p\\\\\\\\\
E[X]&=\frac{1}{p}\\\\\\\\
Var[X]&=\\frac{1-p}{p^2}
\\end{aligned}
$$
